use_case: This prompt wil be used in a chrome extension that will summarise users email in 50 words on demand.
requirements:
- Summarise input in 50 or fewer words
- In bullet points
- In simple words
- No hallucination
initial_prompt: Summarise the email into: 1) Purpose (1 line), 2) Key points (3–5 bullets), 3) Action items (owner + due date), and 4) Suggested 2 short replies. Email: {{emailText}}
